page.title: 06PARENTS TRANSPORT IN WHITTON
page.content: When we asked "do you own a car?" 24 of them did (82%). We were quite surprised to discover that 43% ( 12 families)owned more than 1 car. Parents were asked which method of transport they used to get to work. We ended up with 5 different modes of transport. These were driving a car, taking a bus, riding a bicycle, catching a train and walking.17 mothers were asked and we discovered that 8 went in a car (51%), 3 used the bus (18%), 2 used a bicycle (13%)1 mother took the train (7%) and 3 people walked (21%). We asked the same question of 22 fathers and the results were as follows: 12 drove to work (54%) 0 fathers used the bus 3 fathers rode a bicycle (13%) 4 fathers took the train (16%) 2 fathers walked to work. CHASE BRIDGE SCHOOL
